name: TonyPony
description:
Introduction：

Tow player Party Game, capture the horse to score, player who earn more score in two minutes wins.

How to play：

Players will control each cowboy(more like "ponyboy") to capture the horse(the one walk with two legs) wondering in the fields. Anyone captures the horse will earn points . The other could throw rope to the horse to save it from opponent. Or just throw rope to your opponent to make them feel dizzy. Both could lead your opponent lose control to the horse. When time's up, the higher score player will win this game.

Controls：

P1（XBOX controller）：

  1. Left joy stick: Control YOUR horse
  2. Right joy stick :Control the front sight
  3. Right Bumper: Throw the rope
  4. A: Pull the horse to your direction
  5. X : Dash

P2（Key pad）：

  1. WSAD: Control YOUR horse
  2. Arrow keys: Control the front sight
  3. E: Throw the rope
  4. R: Pull the horse to your direction
  5. Small key pad 0：Dash
